ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games
ThinkerPrototype.cs
1 
9 using System;
10 using System.Reflection;
11 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session;
12 
13 namespace ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI
14 {
19  public class ThinkerPrototype : IThinkerPrototype
20  {
21  // Thinker's fully qualified name
22  private string thinkerFQN;
23 
24  // Thinker's configuration parameters
25  private string thinkerParams;
26 
27  // The configuration for matches where created thinkers will play
28  private IMatchConfig matchConfig;
29 
30  // Name of the underlying thinker
31  private string thinkerName;
32 
36  public string ThinkerName
37  {
38  get
39  {
40  // If name is not set, create a temporary instance which will
41  // set the name
42  if (thinkerName == null) Create();
43  return thinkerName;
44  }
45  }
46 
61  public ThinkerPrototype(
62  string thinkerFQN, string thinkerParams, IMatchConfig matchConfig)
63  {
64  // Check if thinkerFQN string contains anything
65  if (thinkerFQN == null || thinkerFQN.Length == 0)
66  {
67  throw new ArgumentException(
68  $"A ThinkerPrototype requires a non-empty Thinker FQN.");
69  }
70 
71  // If AI is not known, thrown an exception
72  if (!ThinkerManager.Instance.IsKnown(thinkerFQN))
73  {
74  throw new ArgumentException(
75  $"No Thinker named '{thinkerFQN}' was found");
76  }
77 
78  // Keep the parameters
79  this.thinkerFQN = thinkerFQN;
80  this.thinkerParams = thinkerParams;
81  this.matchConfig = matchConfig;
82  }
83 
88  public IThinker Create()
89  {
90  // Variable where to place the thinker instance
91  AbstractThinker thinker;
92 
93  // Flags to find the fields to initialize in the thinker instance
94  BindingFlags flags = BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance;
95 
96  // Get the thinker's type
97  Type type = ThinkerManager.Instance.GetTypeFromFQN(thinkerFQN);
98 
99  // Instantiate the AI thinker
100  thinker = (AbstractThinker)Activator.CreateInstance(type);
101 
102  // Initialize the fields of the AI thinker instance
103  typeof(AbstractThinker)
104  .GetField("rows", flags)
105  .SetValue(thinker, matchConfig.Rows);
106  typeof(AbstractThinker)
107  .GetField("cols", flags)
108  .SetValue(thinker, matchConfig.Cols);
109  typeof(AbstractThinker)
110  .GetField("winSequence", flags)
111  .SetValue(thinker, matchConfig.WinSequence);
112  typeof(AbstractThinker)
113  .GetField("roundPiecesPerPlayer", flags)
114  .SetValue(thinker, matchConfig.RoundPiecesPerPlayer);
115  typeof(AbstractThinker)
116  .GetField("squarePiecesPerPlayer", flags)
117  .SetValue(thinker, matchConfig.SquarePiecesPerPlayer);
118  typeof(AbstractThinker)
119  .GetField("timeLimitMillis", flags)
120  .SetValue(thinker, matchConfig.TimeLimitMillis);
121 
122  // Setup the AI thinker instance, implementation dependent
123  thinker.Setup(thinkerParams);
124 
125  // Keep the thinker's name
126  thinkerName = thinker.ToString();
127 
128  // Return the new AI thinker instance
129  return thinker;
130  }
131 
136  public override string ToString() => ThinkerName;
137  }
138 }
